meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vicky Ficco Seth Davis Kerrie McCaw Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1620.

td.p: Vicky Ficco, a registered nurse from Tappan, New York
Seth Davis, an environmental lawyer from Croton-on-Hudson, New York
Kerrie McCaw, a retail supervisor originally from Portland, Oregon (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,000)

tr.td: SCIENCE & NATURE
TRAVEL & TOURISM
FAIRIES & FOLKLORE
MAGAZINES
BROADWAY LYRICS
GREAT NICKNAMES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The first president to serve 8 full years')

tr.td: U.S. PRESIDENTS
The first president to serve 8 full years
Kerrie
Seth
Vicky
2nd place: a set of Pinseeker custom-made golf clubs + a hammock from Hatteras
New champion: $10,601
3rd place: the Dauville diamond watch collection by Armitron + the Nintendo Entertainment System featuring Super Jeopardy! & Wheel of Fortune
Kerrie
Seth
Vicky

15 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

(including 1 DD),
